meanings.definition: The act of presiding over a meeting or event as the chairperson.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the chairing by Sarah kept everyone organized.
meanings.sent2: The chairing of the event by John ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The chairing of the game of musical chairs got intense as the music stopped.
meanings.sent4: Her chairing of the meeting was like a conductor leading an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The chairing of the debate made her the center of attention.

meanings.definition: Providing chairs for people to sit on.
meanings.sent1: The chairing arrangement in the waiting room was comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The chairing service at the event made guests feel welcome.
meanings.sent3: The chairing design in the office was stylish and modern.
meanings.sent4: The chairing setup in the classroom was neat and orderly.
meanings.sent5: The chairing selection in the restaurant was diverse and appealing.

meanings.definition: The position of being the chairperson of a committee or organization.
meanings.sent1: Her chairing of the committee brought new ideas to the table.
meanings.sent2: The chairing of the organization required strong leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The chairing of the club made her the go-to person for decisions.
meanings.sent4: His chairing of the team was crucial for its success.
meanings.sent5: The chairing of the council involved making important decisions.
